{"id":422842934,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1606020615,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/422842934/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        bool let[300];\n        int max=0;\n        int cnt;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            cnt=0;\n            memset(let,false,sizeof(let));\n            for(int j=i;j<s.size();j++){\n                if(let[s[j]]){\n                    break;\n                }\n                cnt++;\n                if(cnt>max) max=cnt;\n                let[s[j]]=true;\n            }\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
